text: Crivello is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Anthony Crivello (born 1955), American actor and singer *Max Crivello (born 1958), Italian artist, illustrator, and cartoonist *Roberto Crivello (born 1991), Italian footballer ==See also== *20690 Crivello, a main-belt asteroid Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Crivello
